snippet.title: Dead Monarchy - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
You can wishlist the game at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037940/Dead_Monarchy/

Music by Nicolas Jeudy.

Hey guys, I initially made my game known nearly 2 years ago and I had planned to go into Early Access towards the end of 2017 but after feedback from a couple demos I decided to delay it and keep working on the game. So here we are 2 years after, here is the Early Access trailer. I am hoping to release into Early Access this year, sometime in June. After 7000+ hours, I am finally at the starting line.

More info can be found on my website: https://dead-monarchy.com/

You can also follow Dead Monarchy on Twitter and Facebook: @Dead_Monarchy.

https://twitter.com/Dead_Monarchy
https://www.facebook.com/Dead-Monarchy-1937135289649828/

I'm also on the codex, I post quite frequently there and then branch out to other forums.

http://www.rpgcodex.net/forums/index.php?threads/dead-monarchy-medieval-turn-based-mass-tactics-survival-simulator-rpg.115896/
